item.description:
Picture yourself overlooking the harbor, a fresh sea breeze to cool you off and sipping on your favorite summer brew...Could it be any better? Sure, if you are in the company of fellow Sitzers and guests doing the same

Afterwards, we will take a short walk to the Boston Harbor Hotel to watch and dance to the sounds of Rythm & Blues performed by "Rare Form". 

 

Directions:

The Daily Catch is accessible by the MBTA Red Line and Silver Line. Take the Red Line to South Station and the Silver Line to the Court House stop. You can also walk to the Courthouse from South Station. Just walk via the water to the Old Northern Avenue Bridge. The Courthouse is just across this bridge.

If you are driving, cross the Moakley Bridge and park at one of the open parking lots near the Court House.
item.name: An August Afterwork followed by Music from the 50's & dancing, Oh my!
